name: Classic-iib-shell-scripts
tagline: Original Classic scripts for multi instance brokers.  This project is deprecated and will be replaced by open-deploy that is still WIP.
body:
#classic-iib-shell-scripts (Old IIB utility scripts for Unix)

**Classic scripts for multi instance brokers**
## Overview
This repository contains an old utility framework to help automate the management and deployment of IBM Integration Bus Projects.

**NOTE: This Project is Deprecated**.
***
This project is deprecated and will be replaced by open-deploy that is still WIP. 
***
